name: Holiday Inn Express Hyderabad Banjara Hills
desc: Holiday Inn Express Hyderabad Banjara Hills is a hotel offering accommodations in Hyderabad. The property is located a 7-minute walk from City Center Mall, a 19-minute walk from Banjara Hills and 1.2 mi from Jalavihar. The property is 1.3 mi from Ravindra Bharathi. Free WiFi and parking facility is provided. At the hotel, each room includes a flat screen TV and a desk. The rooms are soundproof and have centralized air-conditioning. Every room comes with a private bathroom and hot and cold LED showers. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include Hindi and English. Laundry and is offered. The property has a fitness center.

desc: Overlooking the scenic Hussain Sagar Lake, Justa The Residence offers modern rooms with flat-screen TVs in Hyderabads city centre. The hotel features a rooftop restaurant, shops and free parking.

name: Hotel Quality Inn Residency
desc: Located just 4 km from the ancient Charminar, Hotel Quality Inn Residency offers a 24-hour front desk and free Wi-Fi throughout the property.

name: OYO Flagship 22712 Raichandani
desc: Attractively situated in the Dilsukhnagar district of Hyderabad, OYO Flagship 22712 Raichandani is situated 7 km from Charminar, 8 km from Mecca Masjid and 8 km from Chowmahalla Palace.

name: The Icon Apartments
desc: Well set in the HITEC City district of Hyderabad, The Icon Apartments is located 8 km from Banjara Hills, 8 km from ISB and 10 km from Golkonda Fort.

name: Hotel Srinivasa Central
desc: OYO 9627 Hotel Srinivasa Central is located in Hyderabad, within 900 metres of Ravindra Bharathi and AP State Archaeology Museum. The property is set 2 km from City Centre Mall.

name: OYO 23542 Flagship Hotel Shyam
desc: Located in Hyderabad, 3.5 km from Snow World, OYO 23542 Flagship Hotel Shyam provides accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking.
